```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE)
```

```{r figs, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, fig.align='center', out.width='100%'}
# paths in the order to show
paths <- unname(unlist(params$figures[params$include], use.names = FALSE))
if (length(paths)) {
  caps <- params$include
  knitr::opts_current$set(fig.cap = caps)   # captions = names
  knitr::include_graphics(paths)            # one call renders all
} else {
  knitr::asis_output("No figures selected.\n")
}
```
